main.name: Uelmar Ortega
main.description: I'm a Laravel developer who also likes Vue.js
main.bio: I am a musician at heart, with an insatiable desire to learn, and a passion for building useful web applications. Early in my career as a web developer, I have had the priveledge to build complex web applications from the ground up using Laravel. Now, with the advent of front-end Javascript frameworks like Vue.js and others like it, I have learned to love and to utilize the Javascript programming language in order to build fast and effecient Single Page Applications.
main.contactmessage: Do you think I am a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you. Kindly send me an email, text or email me.

resume.skillmessage: Here are programming skills that I am most comfortable.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: A japanese company situated in Cebu Business Park. Nexseed provides a variety of services namely teaching English and programming to Japanese students. Nexseed also provides Software Development and Maintainance services.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: A startup company located in Minglanilla City. AguyIknow is made up of web developers, 2D/3D animators making multimedia and e-learning contents for Martial Schools in Australia. AguyIknow also has talented software developers who are currently making some cool web applications to provide additional useful services to their clients.

projects.title: Jobseed
projects.category: Job Search Software / Human Resource Tool

recommendations.text: I consider myself fortunate to have worked alongside Uelmar over the last 1 and half years at Nexseed. Benefiting from his sharing of programming experience.
I highly recommend Uelmar. In my view, he has all the qualifications required of full stack engineer. He has always pursued his own path, and enjoyed everything, involving his tasks.
recommendations.user: Reo Okumura - Senior Full Stack Web Developer - Nexseed Inc.
